application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 20/01997/FUL: network pressure (11) in respect of demolition of buildings C3b, C3c and C3e and erection of a new 3FE Primary School with nursery (2 storey) and a new 6FE Secondary School with sixth form (part 3 and part 4 storey), together with associated community hub, parking, highways works to provide access to the proposed schools and community hub, landscaping and outdoor sport provision.
